title: This seems to work great!
description:
I always bought premix for my Stihl weedeater, blower and hedge trimmer but decided to save some money and mix my own gas w/oil.
Stabil has a good reputation as a gas additive to keep gas fresh.
The oil mix seems to allow my equipment to start easier, run smoother and quieter.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023

title: What's in this stuff? A miracle healing elixir
description:
My 4-year-old 2-cycle Hitachi leaf blower simply refused to start last week after winter storage.  I replaced the spark plug, air filter, used fresh gas, - you name it and I tried it. Thought my arm was going to fall off after repeated fruitless pulling.
As a last ditch effort I decided to switch brands of 2-cycle oil. Bought the Sta-Bil 2-cycle oil twelve pack of mini-bottles. It was the most economical (per ounce) way to buy and I could use it in my 2-cycle weed whacker too.
Poured a full mini-bottle of Sta-Bil oil into my one-gallon gas can, added fresh gas from my bigger 5-gallon gas can, gave the smaller can a quick shake to ensure everything was mixed, and poured this into the old Hitachi. Pumped the flex ball to push gas thru the carburetor and I walked away. After 45 minutes I returned, pumped the flex ball again to be sure things were primed, said a quick prayer, and pulled the cord.
After the third pull I heard a pop, adjusted the carburetor choke, and on the next pull the engine started up. It's been starting on the second pull ever since.  Did the Sta-Bil oil make the difference? Who knows...
But before you toss out your 2-cycle small engine - give this oil a try. Sure glad I did.
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023

title: Less to worry about
description: I used it in my chainsaw gas mix for a few tanks. chainsaw still working with no issues. Left the mixed fuel to sit for 6 months and chainsaw started with no issues. It is a good price and a huge convinience that it does actually function as a fuel stabilizer.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
